Sentencas: This work focuses on investigating the adaptability of solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine (SOFC-GT) hybrid system for ship application under uncertain factors.
Titulo: Fast and stable operation approach of ship solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid system under uncertain factors

Sentencas: The effect of rapids, wind and waves on the performance of ship SOFC-GT is analyzed.
Titulo: Fast and stable operation approach of ship solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid system under uncertain factors

Sentencas: In addition, a novel control system combining fuzzy logic theory, temperature feedforward and coordination factor on-line adjustment is proposed to address the problem of load disturbances caused by uncertain factors.
Titulo: Fast and stable operation approach of ship solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid system under uncertain factors

Sentencas: The results show that the proposed operation strategy can shorten the thermal response time inside fuel cell stacks by almost 49.97%, meanwhile, reducing the maximum temperature changing rate at the electrochemically active tri-layer cell composed of anode, electrolyte, and cathode (PEN structure) by around 17.86%.
Titulo: Fast and stable operation approach of ship solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid system under uncertain factors

Sentencas: Moreover, the reasonable matching between air flow and fuel flow is an essential prerequisite to ensure the safe and efficient operation of ship SOFC-GT.
Titulo: Fast and stable operation approach of ship solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid system under uncertain factors

Sentencas: While the SOFC-GT is working at full load, the results indicate that the fuel to air ratio cannot exceed 2.56.10(-2)
Titulo: Fast and stable operation approach of ship solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid system under uncertain factors
Fast and stable operation approach of ship solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid system under uncertain factors

Sentencas: Finally, an application scenario of the 5000-ton river-to-sea cargo ship sails from Nanjing Port to Yangshan Port (Eastern China) is conducted to analyze the operation characteristics of ship SOFC-GT under uncertain factors.
Titulo: Fast and stable operation approach of ship solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid system under uncertain factors

Sentencas: Two set of 1000 kW SOFC-GT systems with the electrical efficiency of 64.66% is designed for the target ship, the results conclude that the operation strategy of each SOFC-GT system supports 50% load is beneficial in reducing the power tracking time and SOFC temperature overshoot.
Titulo: Fast and stable operation approach of ship solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid system under uncertain factors

Sentencas: The average electrical efficiency of 61.45% and 61.04% are achieved in winter and summer typical days respectively in the whole voyage.
Titulo: Fast and stable operation approach of ship solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine hybrid system under uncertain factors
